Room.Name: Overland Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Overland Drive, just east of the Klondike Wheat Fields.
Room.LongDescription: The reason there are not more diagonally running roads in town is because they create useless slivers of land that no one in their right minds would want to develop. Such is the case with the sliver of land created by the crossing of Appleton Road, Overland Drive and Waterfront Way. A small monument has been placed in the sliver of land on the east. The Klondike Wheat Fields are located to the west, the entrance to which is located along Lankshire Drive on the west side of the fields.
